strings.description: A monster inside a purple pot. Nothing makes it happier than sharpening its magic power, and it always carries around a magic cane. Little is known about these enigmatic creatures, but some believe they were created by the gods themselves to collect knowledge of the various powers existing in the world. Smart pots are obsessed with anything and everything relating to MAG, information relating to which they keep in their pots.
strings.summon:
You need my power?
You have quite the eye, don't you?
